attributes.additional_details:
Cash 4 Phones Mobile Phone recycle company based in  London is committing fraud to hundreds of customers across the UK.
Taking delivery of mobile phones and not paying for them, to which is theft.
They dont respond to emails & the telephone is an automated message to which nobody responds.
So basically this company is getting mobile phones for free!
This company needs to be stopped.
delivery of phones address:
Cash 4 Phones
15 Gateway Mews
Ring Way,
London,
N11 2UT.
Cash4phones have a new director and a new address which is:
C4P Trading Ltd SUITE 21 5 SPRING STREET PADDINGTON LONDON UNITED KINGDOM W2 3AQ
Company Registration No on Companies House: 06300042 Director: MR NEARCHOS CHACHOLIADES as of 31/10/13
website:http://www.cash4phones.co.uk/
